posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: 博客诞生记！本博客使用 Hexo + Next + Github Pages花费10分钟搭建而成
posts.text: 博客诞生记！本博客使用 Hexo + Next + Github Pages花费10分钟搭建而成Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post"More info: WritingRun server1$ hexo serverMore info: ServerGenerate static files1$ hexo generateMore info: GeneratingDeploy to remote sites1$ hexo deployMore info: Deployment图片
